definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Papa would bring an old battered coal shovel and an old-fashioned ice chest with him.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷总会带来一把破旧的煤铲和一台老式冰柜。

sentences.english: THE old-fashioned financial system was like Old Maid, a parlour game once beloved of small children.
sentences.chinese: 老式的金融系统就象是小孩子喜欢玩的一种扑克牌。

sentences.english: But Georgia banks blew themselves up with old-fashioned loans gone bad.
sentences.chinese: 但乔治亚州的银行却因老式贷款坏账而引爆自身。

sentences.english: Mother's old-fashioned quartz watch was inherited from my grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 老式石英表是姥姥留给她的。

sentences.english: It was an old-fashioned lift, operated by a lever on a brass box.
sentences.chinese: 这是一部老式的电梯，由一个黄铜框架上的杠杆操纵。

sentences.english: Fifties glamour fit for a vintage vixen.
sentences.chinese: 五十年代的魅力适合老式的狐狸精。

sentences.english: Make vintage furnishings part of your style.
sentences.chinese: 老式风格的家具更有味道。

sentences.english: This can go beyond old-fashioned trust falls to more imaginative retreats.
sentences.chinese: 这可以超越老式的信任，达到更富有想象力的改变。

sentences.english: The piano has a quaint old-world tone about it.
sentences.chinese: 这架钢琴的音色具有一种古雅的老式风味。

sentences.english: Although the buildings here seem old-fashioned, they have a peculiar flavor of their own.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦的建筑物看上去老式的，但它们独具风格。

sentences.english: The old-fashioned idea is that women withhold sex when they want power.
sentences.chinese: 老式的想法是当女人想要权力的时候会克制性。

sentences.english: There was a large building in front of me with an old fashioned thatched roof.
sentences.chinese: 我前面是一座大房子，它的老式屋顶是用茅草盖的。

sentences.english: Hondo :How can I trust a man who won't eat a good old-fashioned American hotdog?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么能信任一个不愿吃老式美国热狗的人？

sentences.english: The most luxurious outdoor home theaters are nostalgic reminders of the drive-in theaters of old.
sentences.chinese: 最奢华的户外电影院是老式汽车影院的怀旧翻版。

sentences.english: I prefer the old fine-lined illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 我偏爱线条细致的老式插画。

sentences.english: Making magic in the movie in my old Chevrolet.
sentences.chinese: 在我的老式雪佛莱汽车里演绎着银幕上的奇迹。

definition: standardized/standard (service, method etc)/regulation (clothing etc)/formulaic/(telecommunications etc) system/format (e.g. the PAL or NTSC systems for TV signals)
